note.value:
Fol. 27v a : II, 4 = C. Tischendorf, Evangelia Apocrypha, 216:5–7.
Fol. 27v b : II, 4 (last word) – 5 = C. Tischendorf, Evangelia Apocrypha, p. 216:11-217:5
fol. 27r a : II, 5 = C. Tischendorf, Evangelia Apocrypha, 217:6–9.
Fol. 27r b :  II, 5 (last word) – 6 = C. Tischendorf, Evangelia Apocrypha, 217:12–218:1
Bibliography: S. Brock, "A fragment of the Acta Pilati in Christian Palestinian Aramaic," Journal of Theological Studies 22 (1971), 157–158
